Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the Australian Federal Budget and its impact on citizens. The Labor Party delivered the budget and there's been plenty of excitement and controversy surrounding its contents. The budget promises to address various challenges such as housing healthcare and small businesses. Some of the biggest announcements include an increase in funding for Veterans' services the largest-ever increase to Medicare bulk billing and expanded eligibility criteria for first-time home buyers. Overall people are grateful for the relief and support the budget provides for Australians.
